tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Rizvi is calm composed. My earlier experience with other dentist has made be develop a kind of phobia with the word.. dentist..,but after having a talk with Dr.Rizvi and undergoing the extraction, am much content and happy.. 
No words to express my gratitude. 
The staff is also co operative and make you feel relax..
 Thanks to Dr Rehan for having me referred to Dr.Rizvi. 
 Thanks a million doctor, I felt as if you came as a savior to me after all the pain I have gone through last week..
Dr Rizvi does his job with perfection.
I would recommend Dr.Rizvi for all the dental issues as his way of approach is too good and makes you feel that you are in safe hands..
May Almighty God bless you abundantly
reply_text:
Thank U so much Mrs Mobeen for ur your kind and generous feedback.
I would like to Thanx Dr Rehan too for guiding her properly.
I feel blessed to serve and to satisfy the patients who had phobia and whose previous experience was not good.
Thanx again for ur ur kindness.

review: Usually I do not spare time to post reviews but this man is a blessing in disguise. I was extremely happy with the way he treated my issue. Now a days it's hard to find such fine doctors in the market especially in dental field. I have consulted many dentists earlier *** ***** ** **** ****** ** *** **** ******* ** ********* ***** * *** ********** So, stop wasting your hard earned income on costly hospitals and fancy names with no success. Walk in to Denta Glo now!😊

I Thank u from bottom of my heart for such a positive response. This review will definitely help other patients for choosing better Dentist.

review: I visited the clinic for Tooth extraction and also to inquire about gap filling between teeth. Tooth extraction was a painless procedure and it took hardly few minutes.I am happy about that..I am going with Aligners and I will keep updating about the results..Best thing is I have visited few clinics in Hyderabad earlier..They were super expensive and very forceable.But this doctor isn't like that. He explained the procedure very patiently..I am waiting to see results with my aligners..Cost effective..I will share my reviews once again after the space filling treatment is completed..Thanks Dr. Syed Saood  and team..Keep up the great work..
